title: Spice container
description: tower shape with filigree decoration and 6 bells; flag on top with 6 flags on top of filigree compartment; small hinged door on one side
provenance: (Weisberg Religious Articles, New York); Collection of Harold & Mickey Smith, St. Paul, Minnesota purchased in 1983; Gift to the MIA in 2001.
creditline: Gift of Harold and Mickey Smith
